statements: SELECT * FROM polling_locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM polling_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name, manager_name FROM polling_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT location_name FROM polling_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, manager_name FROM polling_locations WHERE location_id > 5 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM polling_locations WHERE manager_name LIKE 'A%' AND location_address NOT LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT location_name, manager_name FROM polling_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Center%' OR location_address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations WHERE location_address LIKE '%Square%' AND manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM polling_locations;
SELECT location_name, address, city FROM polling_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM voting_machines WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, state, zip_code FROM polling_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_locations FROM polling_locations;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT machine_type, location_name FROM voting_machines JOIN polling_locations ON voting_machines.location_id = polling_locations.location_id;
SELECT address, city, state, zip_code FROM polling_locations WHERE city LIKE 'New%';
SELECT location_name, machine_type FROM voting_machines JOIN polling_locations ON voting_machines.location_id = polling_locations.location_id WHERE state = 'Texas';
SELECT * FROM voting_machines WHERE machine_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM PollingLocations;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM PollingLocations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT location_name, address FROM PollingLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM VotingMachines WHERE status='active';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM MachineLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PollingLocations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT machine_type, status FROM VotingMachines WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY machine_type DESC;
SELECT voting.location_name, machines.machine_type FROM PollingLocations AS voting JOIN VotingMachines AS machines ON voting.location_id = machines.location_id WHERE machines.status = 'Active';
SELECT machine_id, log_timestamp FROM MachineLogs WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM log_timestamp) = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PollingLocations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM polling_locations;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM polling_locations ORDER BY state ASC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_type FROM voting_machines WHERE status='Active';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_message FROM machine_logs WHERE machine_id=1;
SELECT election_name AS Election, candidate_name AS Candidate, votes_received AS Votes FROM election_results WHERE winning_candidate=true;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM polling_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT machine_id, machine_type, status FROM voting_machines WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_message FROM machine_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT election_name, candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE winning_candidate = TRUE ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM polling_locations WHERE zipcode = 12345;
SELECT * FROM voting_machines WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, is_active FROM voting_machines WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT m.machine_id, mh.action, mh.action_date FROM voting_machines m JOIN machine_history mh ON m.machine_id = mh.machine_id ORDER BY mh.action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM polling_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT machine_name, purchase_date FROM voting_machines WHERE is_active = true AND purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM polling_locations ORDER BY zipcode DESC;
SELECT mh.history_id, mh.action, mm.maintenance_type FROM machine_history mh JOIN machine_maintenance mm ON mh.machine_id = mm.machine_id;
SELECT mi.issue_description, mi.reported_by, mm.maintenance_date FROM machine_issues mi JOIN machine_maintenance mm ON mi.machine_id = mm.machine_id;
